item.description: Julia Martell was picking up supplies for her baby when she ran from a man wielding a knife at a Traverse City, Michigan, Walmart. The stabbing attack...

item.title: Israel pauses attacks in some areas in Gaza to allow limited aid in

item.title: Couple killed in Arkansas state park while hiking with 2 daughters, officials say
item.description: A 43-year-old man and a 41-year-old woman were killed at Devil's Den State Park in Arkansas, the state police said.

item.title: How new technology could help pilots improve flight safety
item.description: Pilot spatial disorientation causes 5-10% of all general aviation accidents, the FAA says, and new technology could improve safety.
